name: Defend I.T. Solutions
description: Defend I.T. Solutions provides on-site cybersecurity and tech support tailored to businesses and individuals in The Villages and surrounding areas.

business.title: Cybersecurity Consulting
business.description: Expert guidance and solutions to safeguard your business from cyber threats, ensuring compliance and peace of mind.

business.title: Networking
business.description: Design and implementation of secure, efficient business networks.

business.title: Web & Software Development
business.description: Custom-built web and software solutions to support business operations.

business.title: Data Recovery
business.description: Recovery of lost or damaged data from servers, drives, and cloud systems.

business.title: Threat Analysis
business.description: In-depth analysis to identify vulnerabilities and prevent attacks before they happen.

business.title: Cloud Solutions
business.description: Secure cloud storage and services to enhance business flexibility and scalability.

business.title: IT Support & Maintenance
business.description: Ongoing support and maintenance to keep your IT systems running smoothly.

business.title: Penetration Testing
business.description: Simulated attacks to test the strength of your current security systems.

business.title: Secure Code Review
business.description: Analysis of your codebase to identify and remediate security flaws.

business.title: Firewall Configuration
business.description: Setup and optimization of business-grade firewalls for strong perimeter defense.

business.title: Email Security & Anti-Phishing
business.description: Protect business communication from spoofing, phishing, and malware.

business.title: Security Awareness Training
business.description: Educating staff to recognize threats and follow secure practices.

business.title: IT Consulting
business.description: Expert guidance to align your technology with your business goals.

residential.title: Advanced Data Recovery
residential.description: Lost family photos? Corrupt drives? We recover important files from failing hard drives, USBs, and even some deleted data. From your home or securely offsite.

residential.title: Smart Home Security & IoT Lockdown
residential.description: From cameras to speakers, we secure every device connected to your network. We block outside access, limit tracking, and protect your data across your smart home.

residential.title: Computer Repair
residential.description: We diagnose and repair laptops and desktops — fixing hardware, software, and performance issues. Fast, reliable, and explained in plain English.

residential.title: Device Clean-Up & Performance Boost
residential.description: We fine-tune your devices — uninstall bloatware, clean up startup programs, and optimize system settings. The result? Faster boot times, smoother performance, and longer life for your computer.

residential.title: Scam Protection & Fraud Prevention
residential.description: We teach you and your family how to spot tech scams, fake emails, and suspicious phone calls — and we set up call filters, browser protections, and safe defaults to stop them in their tracks.

residential.title: Home Network Security & Privacy Audit
residential.description: We evaluate and harden your Wi-Fi, routers, smart devices, and connected systems to block hackers, trackers, and intruders. You stay safe, private, and in control.

residential.title: Digital Estate Planning
residential.description: We help you organize and protect digital assets — passwords, accounts, and backups — for your family’s future peace of mind.

residential.title: Wi-Fi & Home Network Setup
residential.description: Improve your home internet with stronger Wi-Fi, better coverage, and secure connections.

residential.title: Firewall Installation & Privacy Hardening
residential.description: We install tools to block tracking, secure your devices, and give your household more privacy online.

residential.title: Ad & Tracker Blocking
residential.description: Faster browsing, fewer ads, and less spying. We install a system that filters junk at the network level.

residential.title: VPN Setup
residential.description: Protect your privacy while online with a secure connection. We handle the setup and explain how it works.

residential.title: Personal Cybersecurity Consulting
residential.description: One-on-one, in-home help to protect your identity, finances, and devices from online threats.

residential.title: Password Management Setup
residential.description: We help you securely manage your passwords across devices using trusted tools. No more sticky notes.

residential.title: Smart Device Configuration
residential.description: We set up your smart home tech so it works smoothly and safely. Done on-site and explained clearly.

residential.title: Parental Controls & Safe Browsing
residential.description: Protect kids and guests online with age-appropriate filters and content restrictions.

residential.title: Data Backup Solutions
residential.description: We help you set up automatic backups of important files, so you never lose your memories or documents.

residential.title: Virus & Malware Removal
residential.description: We clean your systems of harmful software and strengthen defenses to prevent future infections.

residential.title: Home Office Setup
residential.description: We design and install reliable, secure work-from-home tech setups. Perfect for remote work or personal productivity.

services_cta.headline: Need local IT help you can trust?
services_cta.subtext: We come to you — fast, friendly, and secure. Book your free consultation today.
